# dratman

[![lifecycle](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)
[![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.org/maurolepore/dratman.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/maurolepore/dratman)

This is a personal package to make it easier to add packages to a drat repository, including source, and windows and mac binaries.

## Installation

```R
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("maurolepore/dratman")
```
